H0.text: In which famous book of 1880 does a character named Peter, feeling deprived of attention by the title character push a young girl named Clara's wheelchair down a mountain to it's destruction . Anne of Green Gables

H1.text: In which famous book of 1880 does a character named Peter, feeling deprived of attention by the title character push a young girl named Clara's wheelchair down a mountain to it's destruction . The Tenant of Wildfell Hall

H2.text: In which famous book of 1880 does a character named Peter, feeling deprived of attention by the title character push a young girl named Clara's wheelchair down a mountain to it's destruction . The Mill on the Floss

H3.text: In which famous book of 1880 does a character named Peter, feeling deprived of attention by the title character push a young girl named Clara's wheelchair down a mountain to it's destruction . HEIDI

A4.text: Peter, jealous of Heidi's and Klara's friendship, pushes her empty wheelchair down the mountain.

A5.text: He is soon wracked with guilt about what he did and ultimately confesses to it.
